data.title: Kaji Yuki, Taniyama Kisho, Fukuyama Jun, Konishi Katsuyuki, and Others Will Say “Happy New Year” on the Phone! New Year’s Card Feat. 24 Voice Actors
data.text:
“2023 37card New Year’s Card”, featuring Ono Yuki, Kaji Yuki, Taniyama Kisho, Hayashi Yu, Murase Ayumu, and other voice actors, have been released. You can hear their voice saying “Happy New Year” on the phone.

This product is a New Year’s Card using the system called “37card”, through which you can hear voice messages on the phone. You can hear the splendid voice actors’ “Happy New Year” by registering the phone number and secret code written on the back side of the New Year’s Card.

The voice messages and photos used for the New Year’s Card were newly prepared for the project. The product will come with an original envelope.

There are a total of 24 voice actors featured for the 2023 ver.; Abe Atsushi, Ichikawa Taichi, Umeda Shuichiro, Ono Yuki, Kaji Yuki, Konishi Katsuyuki, Komatsu Shohei, Sato Takuya, Shin Yuuki, Suzuki Ryota, Tachibana Shinnosuke, Taniyama Kisho, Nogami Sho, Hatanaka Tasuku, Hama Kento, Hayashi Yu, Fukunishi Masaya, Fukuyama Jun, Hozumi Yuya, Masumoto Takuya, Masuyama Takeaki, Murase Ayumu, Yashiro Taku, and Yonaga Tsubasa.

As 2023 is the year of the Rabbit, 3 kinds of New Year’s Cards with white color have been prepared for each actor. Their handwritten illustrations and messages are featured.

Furthermore, those who get the voice message by January 31, 2023, will have a chance to join Otoshidama lottery that distributes a mini board with their autograph and daily casual photos, and “Digital Omikuji” that distributes their Omikuji voice and original photos.

“2023 37card New Year’s Card” is priced at 1,000 JPY per piece, and 3,000 JPY for a set of 3. They are available on the online store “MOGU MALL”. Please check out the product webpage for more details.
